title: RP
body: I purchased my RP of $10 dollars about 30 minutes ago and still haven't got it. Please help me it's still processing.

replies.body: There was a brief issue yesterday with some purchases failing.  This should be resolved now, and the store running business as usual.  Let me know if you still have any issues!
So did it charge me ? Because i still haven't got my RP ..

Our billing team would be able to give you some more context for your specific issue.  We can help you out individually by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll respond and get you more info asap!
I've sent one already thank you for the help !
Just happened to me, bought $35 in RP, didn't get jack, even my bank account and riot game me a receipt
So they did charge you correct?
This is really pissing me off :( i've waited almost 2 hours closed the processing screen and relogged. Nothing :(
I checked my bank account and still nothing there, and it's usually instant when i purchase something..
Did it give you ur rp?
lol was bumping post to get a response/action about this, it's been well over 40 minutes now and im still on the processing screen{{champion:32}}
I logged out and logged back in and nothing happened :((((((((( someone told me it usually fixes it
Bump for same reeep in pepperonis
EXACTLY the same thing is happening to me right now!
Dang man ! did u x it out?
